ivardefs.name: authorizationRequired
ivardefs.desc: A boolean flag indicating whether a preauthorization is required prior to actual service delivery.

ivardefs.name: authorizationSupporting_
ivardefs.desc: Codes or comments regarding information or actions associated with the preauthorization.

ivardefs.name: authorizationUrl
ivardefs.desc: A web location for obtaining requirements or descriptive information regarding the preauthorization.

ivardefs.name: category
ivardefs.desc: Code to identify the general type of benefits under which products and services are provided.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A richer description of the benefit or services covered.

ivardefs.name: excluded
ivardefs.desc: True if the indicated class of service is excluded from the plan, missing or False indicates the product or service is included in the coverage.

ivardefs.name: modifier_
ivardefs.desc: Item typification or modifiers codes to convey additional context for the product or service.

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: A short name or tag for the benefit.

ivardefs.name: network
ivardefs.desc: Is a flag to indicate whether the benefits refer to in-network providers or out-of-network providers.

ivardefs.name: productOrService
ivardefs.desc: This contains the product, service, drug or other billing code for the item.

ivardefs.name: provider
ivardefs.desc: The practitioner who is eligible for the provision of the product or service.

ivardefs.name: term
ivardefs.desc: The term or period of the values such as 'maximum lifetime benefit' or 'maximum annual visits'.

ivardefs.name: unit
ivardefs.desc: Indicates if the benefits apply to an individual or to the family.

properties.desc: Benefits and optionally current balances, and authorization details by category or service.
